verbose_text: IL-13 is known as a potent inducer of matrix metalloproteinases-9 and cathepsin based proteolytic pathways which stimulate cleavage of latency associated peptide and thus activate TGF-beta [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IL-13 is known as a potent inducer of matrix metalloproteinases-9 and cathepsin-based proteolytic pathways which stimulate cleavage of latency-associated peptide and thus activate TGF-beta
